answer: Based on the provided context, there is no mention that any of the pipeline components were based on deep learning models. The focus is on the development of a full working text processing pipeline for the Portuguese language, the creation of an ontology for criminal law, alignment of thesaurus and terminology with the ontology, and representation of extracted events in a linked knowledge base. The emphasis is on the integration of various NLP processes and the improvement of the system rather than on the specific use of deep learning models.
